p: Figures 3 and 4 show that the BLA level of the rats in the fatigue group was significantly higher than that of the control group after swimming ( P < 0.05). However, inhalation of the EOM significantly decreased the concentrations of BUN and BLA in comparison with the fatigue group ( P < 0.01 or P < 0.001). The BUN and BLA concentrations were even lower than the PEO group and the control group ( P < 0.05).
